episodes.synopsis: A drunk Diego crashes his car. Roberta's forced to go to Elite Way School. Miguel tells his mom he's going to D.F. Mia and Roberta hate each other.
episodes.title: Capítulo 1

episodes.synopsis: Roberta tries to thwart her admission. Miguel has trouble getting in to take admission test. Thanks to her aunt, Lupita will attend school.
episodes.title: Capítulo 2

episodes.synopsis: Lupita's aunt helps Miguel get in to take the test and in exchange asks him to look after her niece. Miguel meets Mia and there's mutual attraction.
episodes.title: Capítulo 3

episodes.synopsis: For Celina's sake, Mia pretends not to like Miguel. In Valle de Bravo Roberta pretends to be drowning to get Mauro's attention. Diego's assaulted.
episodes.title: Capítulo 4

episodes.synopsis: Diego's attackers make it as if he was mugged. Miguel saves him and conceals the truth. Later Miguel struggles with Mia and pushes her over a cliff.
episodes.title: Capítulo 5

episodes.synopsis: On the edge of a cliff, Miguel humiliates Mia for what she did to Celina. Mia decides to hide what happened with Miguel and apologizes to Celina.
episodes.title: Capítulo 6

episodes.synopsis: While secretly planning to destroy him, Miguel expresses admiration for Franco. Roberta kisses Mauro, and José tries to get her to appreciate her mom.
episodes.title: Capítulo 7

episodes.synopsis: Miguel asks Celina to be his girlfriend. Diego and Roberta are on a collision course. Everyone thinks Roberta's been writing the anonymous notes.
episodes.title: Capítulo 8

episodes.synopsis: Roberta pretends to be sick to get out of school. Lupita feels she doesn't fit in at school. Miguel knocks Nico unconscious for insulting him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 9

episodes.synopsis: Lupita wants a room change, but Roberta apologizes and tells her she wants to try to be friends. León threatens to send Diego to a military academy.
episodes.title: Capítulo 10

episodes.synopsis: Celina warns Lupita to stay away from Miguel. Roberta proves she's not a thief. Diego's humiliated before everyone. León gives the principal a car.
episodes.title: Capítulo 11

episodes.synopsis: Franco flips when he learns he's being accused of sexually harrassing Alma and threatens to sue her. Pilar accuses her dad of being corrupt.
episodes.title: Capítulo 12

episodes.synopsis: Mia tells Celina Miguel's not sincere with her, and Nico finds out Miguel doesn't love Celina. At the audition, Roberta hits Mia for turning her down.
episodes.title: Capítulo 13

episodes.synopsis: Vico arrives at the party and slaps Diego for not inviting her. Alma admits on a TV show that Franco never harrassed her. Vico tries to seduce Tomás.
episodes.title: Capítulo 14

episodes.synopsis: Roberta's adamant about getting into the dance group. Franco finds out Miguel lied to him. The principal wants to punish him but Franco dissuades him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 15

episodes.synopsis: Roberta forms her own dance group. Franco's investigating Miguel and finds his last name familiar. Pilar writes about Giovanni, and he threatens her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 16

episodes.synopsis: Mia and Miguel call a truce and pretend not to like each other. The principal finds out about the little boy they're hiding in the school.
episodes.title: Capítulo 17

episodes.synopsis: Miguel is chosen by the Lodge members. José takes a bite from one of Leon's dogs to protect Marcelino. Mia thinks Vico's hiding something.
episodes.title: Capítulo 18

episodes.synopsis: Mia and Roberta look for Lupita to bring her back. The Lodge beats Miguel up to get him to leave. Vico tells Mia she's seeing both Tomás and Diego.
episodes.title: Capítulo 19

episodes.synopsis: José can't find her tutor's name in the files. Roberta and Diego convince everyone to go to a club. Wanting to get back at her, Diego kisses Roberta.
episodes.title: Capítulo 20

episodes.synopsis: Esteban informs Pascual there are no fourth-year students. A brawl breaks out at the club and the police show up. Diego finds out Tomás likes Vico.
episodes.title: Capítulo 21

episodes.synopsis: Gandía won't expel Roberta but expects her to go to counseling. The Lodge members try to run Miguel over. Mia's angry that Miguel's in her home.
episodes.title: Capítulo 22

episodes.synopsis: Miguel lies and says he's worried about Celina to get into Mia's home. Diego hits Tomás for stealing his girlfriend. Nico's dad's very sick.
episodes.title: Capítulo 23

episodes.synopsis: Miguel finds Celina dancing and tells her to confront Mia. After, Roberta and Miguel expose Mia for not wanting Celina to be part of the dance group.
episodes.title: Capítulo 24

episodes.synopsis: The Lodge beats Nico up. Roberta's dance group beats Mia's at the audition. Celina doesn't want to be Mia's friend anymore. Diego finds Marcelino.
episodes.title: Capítulo 25

episodes.synopsis: Roberta becomes Diego's slave for fear he'll tell on her. Pascual tells Vico she must leave the school. Mia and Roberta fight in the middle of class.
episodes.title: Capítulo 26

episodes.synopsis: Celina tells Miguel she's going to kill herself if he leaves her. The dance teacher wants Mia back in the group. Roberta's with Mia in favor of Vico.
episodes.title: Capítulo 27

episodes.synopsis: Alma finds out Lupita's been taking Roberta's place during counseling. Celina confronts Mia over Miguel. León tells Diego to put Roberta in her place.
episodes.title: Capítulo 28

episodes.synopsis: Mia's punished for leading the protest in favor of Vico. Marcelino shows Roberta how much he loves her. Mia and Miguel find Celina in very bad shape.
episodes.title: Capítulo 29

episodes.synopsis: Mia tries to kiss Miguel but gets cold feet. Alma asks Roberta what she's been spending so much money on. Both Roberta and Mia like the new student.
episodes.title: Capítulo 30

episodes.synopsis: Mia's not allowed out and so her date's ruined. Miguel gets Celina to understand they have to split. Roberta has a plan to get out of Diego's grip.
episodes.title: Capítulo 31

episodes.synopsis: Franco asks Miguel to keep an eye on Mia. Roberta's going out with Joaquín but she lies about her parents. Pilar confronts her mom for cheating.
episodes.title: Capítulo 32

episodes.synopsis: Joaquín asks Roberta to be discreet about them. Diego has Roberta do his history assignment. Miguel gets the Lodge to think the old Lodge is back.
episodes.title: Capítulo 33

episodes.synopsis: Joaquín rejects Mia in front of Miguel and convinces her to keep their relationship secret. Miguel learns Joaquín's playing with both Roberta and Mia.
episodes.title: Capítulo 34

episodes.synopsis: Roberta rips into Diego for spreading gossip and tells him she's going to send the tape with his name to all the radio stations as pay back.
episodes.title: Capítulo 35

episodes.synopsis: Marcelino apologizes to Roberta for thinking she gave him up. Mia won't accept Celina's apology. Roberta finds out Diego didn't tell on her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 36

episodes.synopsis: León finds out about the tape and slaps Diego, but Tomás takes the blame. Celina tells Mia about Joaquín and Roberta. A drunken Diego hits his dad.
episodes.title: Capítulo 37

episodes.synopsis: Mia buys Celina a dance outfit. Joaquín finds out Alma's Roberta's mom. Vico tells Mia she'll lose Joaquín if she doesn't have sex with him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 38

episodes.synopsis: Roberta tells Alma she's pregnant and that she broke up with Joaquín. Madariaga advises Diego to fight and not give up. Mia asks Giovanni for a favor.
episodes.title: Capítulo 39

episodes.synopsis: Mia finds out that Miguel told Joaquín her dad's a drug dealer. Roberta rejects Joaquín's sexual advances. Madariaga punishes both Mia and Miguel.
episodes.title: Capítulo 40

episodes.synopsis: Nico's parents want Karen for him, but he likes Lupita. Miguel tells Joaquín the truth about Franco. Roberta gets mad at Enrique for being after Alma.
episodes.title: Capítulo 41

episodes.synopsis: Roberta attacks Vico. León tells Diego that his mom wants a divorce and since that would hurt his image, he must choose to stay with him over her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 42

episodes.synopsis: Roberta tells Teo he's not guilty of his brother's death. Diego tells Roberta Joaquín's cheating on her with Mia and she pushes him down the stairs.
episodes.title: Capítulo 43

episodes.synopsis: Teo wants to know if his brother was high when the accident happened, but his parents deny it. Roberta tells Mia Joaquín's been seeing both of them.
episodes.title: Capítulo 44

episodes.synopsis: Alma gets Roberta to tell her what happened. Franco finds Mia singing at a café and punishes her. Celina tells Mia Vico and Miguel were together.
episodes.title: Capítulo 45

episodes.synopsis: Vico's angry at Celina for saying Miguel spent the night with her. Nico's mom is upset when she learns about Lupita and the fact she's not Jewish.
episodes.title: Capítulo 46

episodes.synopsis: Mia and Roberta get everyone to think Joaquín's gay. Nico breaks up with Lupita for another girl. Miguel and Diego hear the café wants to hire them.
episodes.title: Capítulo 47

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Mendiola threatens to fire Pascual. Miguel tells Franco he's afraid Mia might try to kill herself. Tomás is worried about Diego's self-kidnapping.
episodes.title: Capítulo 48

episodes.synopsis: León thwarts Diego's plan and has his bodyguard arrested for helping him. Enrique tells Diego he's acting like his father and advises him not to.
episodes.title: Capítulo 49

episodes.synopsis: Celina confronts Miguel over Vico. Roberta invites Celina to sing with the band. Roberta and Lupita think José's stealing food and selling it.
episodes.title: Capítulo 50

episodes.synopsis: Celina confronts Miguel over Vico. Roberta invites Celina to sing with the band. Roberta and Lupita think José's stealing food and selling it.
episodes.title: Capítulo 51

episodes.synopsis: Diego's disappointed his mom went back with his dad. Roberta pretends to have panic attacks so Pascual won't expel her. Pascual hires Esteban back.
episodes.title: Capítulo 52

episodes.synopsis: Miguel hits Giovanni when he finds out he's with Celina as a favor and out of pity. Diego argues with Roberta and says one of them must quit the band.
episodes.title: Capítulo 53

episodes.synopsis: Miguel asks Roberta and Diego to stay in the band. Mia has to go to the show with Miguel. Alma takes Marcelino and Dulce to see Roberta and Lupita.
episodes.title: Capítulo 54

episodes.synopsis: Pascual agrees to start a foundation, but the real purpose is to launder money. In front of León, Roberta pretends to be with Diego.
episodes.title: Capítulo 55

episodes.synopsis: Miguel's mom gets upset when she finds out about Elite Way School. Afraid of the Lodge, Vico breaks up with Miguel. Franco and Miguel's mom meet.
episodes.title: Capítulo 56

episodes.synopsis: Franco invites Miguel and his mom to spend Christmas at their house. Miguel's mom doesn't understand why Miguel's going to high school again.
episodes.title: Capítulo 57

episodes.synopsis: Upset, Mia asks Franco why he never wants to talk about her mom. Miguel argues with his mom and tells her he's going to avenge his father's death.
episodes.title: Capítulo 58

episodes.synopsis: Franco sends Alma a message telling her she won't intimidate him. Esteban rips up José's work. Only the boys will participate in the dance contest.
episodes.title: Capítulo 59

episodes.synopsis: Nico's dad's very sick, so the guys in the band decide to help him by giving the money they got from their singing gig. Miguel asks Franco for a loan.
episodes.title: Capítulo 60

episodes.synopsis: Pascual wants Roberta to apologize to Hilda, but Alma intervenes to set the teacher straight. Roberta invites Teo to spend Christmas at her home.
episodes.title: Capítulo 61

episodes.synopsis: Mia doesn't want to give Miguel the check her father sent him. Roberta gets angry at Mia for thinking Miguel made up the story about Nico's dad.
episodes.title: Capítulo 62

episodes.synopsis: Roberta makes Mia think her father died in an accident. Joaquín offers Tomás work running drugs. Roberta and Mia fight each other in a boxing ring.
episodes.title: Capítulo 63

episodes.synopsis: Everyone thinks Mia and Roberta fought over Joaquín. Tomás doesn't want to run drugs but Joaquín threatens him. Nico will quit to help his family.
episodes.title: Capítulo 64

episodes.synopsis: Mia apologizes to Nico. Madariaga finds out Joaquín's been selling drugs in the school. Mia asks Alma if it's true her dad's seeing his lawyer.
episodes.title: Capítulo 65

episodes.synopsis: Carlos accuses Madariaga of taking bribes from León to get Diego to pass. In Cozumel, Nico says goodbye to Miguel and Teo, and Celina shuns Mia.
episodes.title: Capítulo 66

episodes.synopsis: Joaquín denies everything and accuses Tomás. Roberta and Mia don't want to spend New Year's with their parents. The friends organize a beach party.
episodes.title: Capítulo 67

episodes.synopsis: Miguel saves Mia when she tries to jump off a pier. José steals some papers, and Teo takes the blame. Nico accepts his mother's conditions.
episodes.title: Capítulo 68

episodes.synopsis: Peter asks Mia if she knows her dad's with Valeria. Tomás' dad knows all about the principal's foundation and asks to be a part of it.
episodes.title: Capítulo 69

episodes.synopsis: Tomás tells his friends Joaquín forces him to run drugs. Joaquín wants Tomás to run drugs outside the school. Mia and Celina find out Vico's lying.
episodes.title: Capítulo 70

episodes.synopsis: Tomás faces expulsion and plans to run away for fear of his parents. Miguel warns Joaquín to tell the truth. Madariaga wants to call the police.
episodes.title: Capítulo 71

episodes.synopsis: The girls in the dance group get back at Lulú. Mia gets Miguel thrown out of a mall. Alma plans to ruin the romance between Franco and his ex-lawyer.
episodes.title: Capítulo 72

episodes.synopsis: Roberta gets mad at Alma because she thinks she's friends with Mia. Enrique tells Galía to look after Pilar because of her relationship with Joaquín.
episodes.title: Capítulo 73

episodes.synopsis: Mia cries when she hears what Miguel thinks of her and sees him kiss Julieta. Lupita's mom kicks Roberta out of her home for playing with Dulce.
episodes.title: Capítulo 74

episodes.synopsis: Pilar tells Galía that Joaquín doesn't like drugs because he's an athlete. Alma's afraid that Roberta's dad will take her daughter away from her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 75

episodes.synopsis: Alma tells Franco that Roberta's dad wants to take Roberta to Spain with him. Marcelino tells Roberta her mom's afraid of losing her to her dad.
episodes.title: Capítulo 76

episodes.synopsis: Alma tells Roberta that she loves her but that she can't stop her father from taking her with him. Pilar catches Vico and Joaquín kissing.
episodes.title: Capítulo 77

episodes.synopsis: Diego finds out Roberta's in two bands and tells her to choose one. Valeria breaks up with Franco because of Mia. Mia tells on Miguel and Julieta.
episodes.title: Capítulo 78

episodes.synopsis: Mia asks her dad to intervene to stop Miguel's expulsion. The prefect receives love letters and thinks that Mia's sending them.
episodes.title: Capítulo 79

episodes.synopsis: Lulú apologizes for lying to her students. Celina asks Mia to take her place at the band rehearsal. Vico wants Joaquín to leave pilar.
episodes.title: Capítulo 80

episodes.synopsis: Giovanni offers Mia his support. Miguel breaks up with Julieta for fear that the Lodge might harm her. Facundo turns Roberta down for Diego's sake.
episodes.title: Capítulo 81

episodes.synopsis: Joaquín breaks up with Pilar because she won't have sex with him. Vico thinks Mia told Esteban about her love letters. Diego manipulates Roberta.
episodes.title: Capítulo 82

episodes.synopsis: Valeria pretends to be a photographer to get close to Mia. Miguel warns Mia against Esteban. Roberta asks Mia to take her place in the band.
episodes.title: Capítulo 83

episodes.synopsis: Miguel and Esteban get into a fight. Joaquín breaks up with Vico and pretends it's because of the Lodge. Pilar tells Vico she's back with Joaquín.
episodes.title: Capítulo 84

episodes.synopsis: Miguel rebukes Julieta for going out with her former boyfriend. Valeria tells Franco she spent the day with Mía. Paola tries to seduce Diego.
episodes.title: Capítulo 85

episodes.synopsis: Miguel asks Teo to infiltrate him into the Lodge. Mía gets upset when she finds out that Vanesa is really Valeria. Paola must have sex with Diego.
episodes.title: Capítulo 86

episodes.synopsis: Diego tells Paola he's a virgin. Franco asks Miguel to help him find Mía, who learns that her dad hung out with Valeria before meeting her mom.
episodes.title: Capítulo 87

episodes.synopsis: Miguel plans for Rodrigo to invite Teo to join the Lodge. Celina tells Mía that Valeria could tell her everything about her mom.
episodes.title: Capítulo 88

episodes.synopsis: Antonio punishes Roberta, locking her up for throwing the gifts he gave her out the window. Valeria tells Mía that her mother was a drug-using slut.
episodes.title: Capítulo 89

episodes.synopsis: Julieta breaks up with Miguel because she knows he loves Mía. Teo and Miguel fight. Franco is angry at Valeria for telling Mía about her mom.
episodes.title: Capítulo 90

episodes.synopsis: Lupita tells Mía that Teo got into the Lodge because he helped Miguel. José convinces Teo that Roberta is in love with him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 91

episodes.synopsis: Mía accuses Miguel and Esteban of spying on her in the women's bathroom. Miguel asks Julieta to resume their courtship.
episodes.title: Capítulo 92

episodes.synopsis: Esteban tells Mía that when she wants a serious relationship in which she feels loved, he'll be waiting. A man beats Tomás for visiting Lulú.
episodes.title: Capítulo 93

episodes.synopsis: Mía tells Alma that her dad has changed a lot since he started going with Valeria. Nico thinks Lupita is after Karen's cousin.
episodes.title: Capítulo 94

episodes.synopsis: León reminds Paola that he only did her a favor, and forbids her to go near Diego again. Mía accepts Giovanni's request to go steady.
episodes.title: Capítulo 95

episodes.synopsis: Everyone laughs at Giovanni when he tells them Mía asked him to go steady. When a drugged Joaquín faints in class, Esteban doesn't let them get help.
episodes.title: Capítulo 96

episodes.synopsis: Roberta ruins her dad's dinner and pretends that he beats her. Mía plans to use Joaquín's evidence of where he takes and sells drugs.
episodes.title: Capítulo 97

episodes.synopsis: Lupita finds Mía's diary among Nico's things. Franco asks Mía not to believe the rumors people are making up about her mom.
episodes.title: Capítulo 98

episodes.synopsis: Diego discovers the gem that León gave Paola and breaks up with her. Mía plans to get back at Miguel for reading her diary. Joaquín starts drug rehab.
episodes.title: Capítulo 99

episodes.synopsis: Mía asks Raquel to tell Miguel that she's crazy for him when he's alone or with Julieta. Paola tells Diego the truth about her life.
episodes.title: Capítulo 100

episodes.synopsis: Mía finds out about her mom's past. Now reconciled with Paola, Diego hides her so she can stay in school.
episodes.title: Capítulo 101

episodes.synopsis: Giovanni stands by Mía after learning how her mother died. After talking with Valeria and learning the truth, Mía accepts that her mother was a tart.
episodes.title: Capítulo 102

episodes.synopsis: Roberta discovers Diego's relationship with Paola. Mía, who has left school, takes refuge with Alma, while Miguel and Mayra look for her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 103

episodes.synopsis: Giovanni gets mad when Miguel goes to look for Mia. Roberta feels betrayed when she finds Mia with Alma. Miguel finds Mia at Alma's house. They kiss.
episodes.title: Capítulo 104

episodes.synopsis: On their return to school, Miguel tells Mía they can't be sweethearts, and that they must forget what happened between them. Miguel dumps Julieta.
episodes.title: Capítulo 105

episodes.synopsis: A jealous Roberta asks Alma to choose between Mía and her. Miguel confesses to Mía what he feels for her; they agree to hide their relationship.
episodes.title: Capítulo 106

episodes.synopsis: Mía loses faith in her dad. Franco believes that Alma is setting Mía against him. Miguel wants to stop hiding his relationship with Mía.
episodes.title: Capítulo 107

episodes.synopsis: Alma comes to Franco's house; he is drunk and kisses her. Mía confesses to Giovanni that she loves another, and breaks up with him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 108

episodes.synopsis: Valeria warns Alma away from Franco. After kissing with Miguel, Mía runs away. Later she apologizes to him and says she wants him to make her a woman.
episodes.title: Capítulo 109

episodes.synopsis: Celina quits the band and asks Mía to take her place. Miguel takes Mía to her house so that she'll make up with her dad.
episodes.title: Capítulo 110

episodes.synopsis: Teo tells Miguel that he passed the test the members of the Lodge put him through, thanks to his girlfriend. Franco tells Mía about her mom.
episodes.title: Capítulo 111

episodes.synopsis: Franco tells Miguel that Mía has matured since she's been in love. Alma, Valeria and Carlo join Mía, Miguel and his dad over the weekend.
episodes.title: Capítulo 112

episodes.synopsis: Paola tells Roberta what's going on between León and her. Miguel apologizes to Mía for mistreating her when she asks him about his family.
episodes.title: Capítulo 113

episodes.synopsis: Diego, Giovanni, Roberta, Lupita, Miguel and Mía are successful with their show. Giovanni's mom embarrasses him when Tomás's mom invites her over.
episodes.title: Capítulo 114

episodes.synopsis: Miguel gets upset because Mía invites his mom and sister to Cuernavaca. Luisa weeps when she learns that her son Giovanni is ashamed of his family.
episodes.title: Capítulo 115

episodes.synopsis: When Tomás tells Diego about Luisa, he pokes fun at her, and Giovanni beats him up. Lupita asks Nico why Miguel is worried about Mía.
episodes.title: Capítulo 116

episodes.synopsis: Rodrigo tells Teo that he's failed the Lodge. Nico tells Lupita that Miguel feels he's betraying his dad by loving Mía. Rodrigo tells Miguel that Julieta is ill, and not to ask for her any more.
episodes.title: Capítulo 117

episodes.synopsis: Lupita tells Mía that, although she loves Miguel, perhaps he's not ready to have a girlfriend. Giovanni is sorry and really wants to see his parents.
episodes.title: Capítulo 118

episodes.synopsis: Lupita tells Mía that Miguel became her boyfriend out of revenge. Mía insults Miguel and tells everyone that she went with him on a bet.
episodes.title: Capítulo 119

episodes.synopsis: Roberta doesn't want her mom's reputation to cast a shadow on her career in the band. Mía slaps Miguel.
episodes.title: Capítulo 120

episodes.synopsis: Carlo tells Roberta he's interested in her mom, not her. José confesses to Teo that it was she who sent him the e-mails, not Roberta.
episodes.title: Capítulo 121

episodes.synopsis: Miguel is pleased when Mía quits the band, but Diego tells her it would be a mistake. Vico talks Mía into staying in the group.
episodes.title: Capítulo 122

episodes.synopsis: The kids in the band need to be invited to the Otro Rollo program to get exposure. Franco gives Carlo another opportunity to work.
episodes.title: Capítulo 123

episodes.synopsis: Tomás and Giovanni try to cover Diego up with Alicia. Everyone in school finds out that José made fun of Teo.
episodes.title: Capítulo 124

episodes.synopsis: Roberta asks Teo to forgive her. José blames Lupita for writing the anonymous letters about Teo.
episodes.title: Capítulo 125

episodes.synopsis: Mía, Giovanni, Miguel, Lupita, Diego and Roberta decide to name their band RBD. During the Otro Rollo program, Lenny Kravitz gives Roberta his guitar.
episodes.title: Capítulo 126

episodes.synopsis: Adal Ramones hears the kids and invites them to his program. RBD performs on the Otro Rollo program; some classmates must ensure that no one sees it.
episodes.title: Capítulo 127

episodes.synopsis: Celina and Vico tell Mía what they did to make sure that no one saw them on television.
episodes.title: Capítulo 128

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Calderón tells the police he was locked up with the teacher Hilda. Roberta and José mistakenly thought Mr. Calderón was her lover.
episodes.title: Capítulo 129

episodes.synopsis: After Roberta kisses Diego, Paola demands that he quit the band not to be near him. Nico asks Lupita to think of her future and not drop out.
episodes.title: Capítulo 130

episodes.synopsis: Diego decides to leave the band, but Nico tells him he's under a signed contract. Nico and Mía blame Roberta for Diego's desire to quit the band.
episodes.title: Capítulo 131

episodes.synopsis: Mía starts a campaign to help conserve the Chapultepec Forest. Gastón gives her a gift.
episodes.title: Capítulo 132

episodes.synopsis: Diego reveals his love for Paola to his mom. Roberta asks Facundo not to let Diego into his band. León gets an e-mail with photos of Diego and Paola.
episodes.title: Capítulo 133

episodes.synopsis: Leon phones Paola to threaten her and demands that she put Diego on the line. Mía gets angry at Miguel for inventing that she's dating Gastón.
episodes.title: Capítulo 134

episodes.synopsis: León gives Paola a few days to take leave of Diego. Miguel demands that Gastón stay away from Mía, and Gastón accuses José of being a thief.
episodes.title: Capítulo 135

episodes.synopsis: Roberta helps Diego run away from the school. Paola tells Diego she wants a new life in which no one knows her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 136

episodes.synopsis: Roberta asks Paola to tell Diego the type of relationship she had with León. In the belief that Teo planned the theft of the wallet, José hits him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 137

episodes.synopsis: Roberta tells Mabel that Diego ran away with his girlfriend. All the teachers complain to Gandía about the theft of their wallets and cell phones.
episodes.title: Capítulo 138

episodes.synopsis: The Lodge members are furious because they didn't succeed in getting José expelled. Nico tells Teo his plan to help José was very risky.
episodes.title: Capítulo 139

episodes.synopsis: Roberta plans a trip so Mabel can look for Diego in Puebla, but she'll have to go. Franco gets mad when Alma says Mia's going to model lingerie.
episodes.title: Capítulo 140

episodes.synopsis: Teo tells Miguel and Nico that the room guardian has a black eye; they suspect Tomás and Giovanni. León finds out that Diego ran away from school.
episodes.title: Capítulo 141

episodes.synopsis: Leon tells Mabel Paola is a prostitute. Mabel asks Roberta to make Leon believe Diego ran away with her. Diego refuses to leave Paola.
episodes.title: Capítulo 142

episodes.synopsis: In the hospital, Paola rejects Diego when she sees León coming. Nico forbids Tomás from going out with Lupita. León tells Diego that Paola is a whore.
episodes.title: Capítulo 143

episodes.synopsis: Gastón invites Mía out. Franco and Valeria go to the school because they suspect that Mía declined their invitation to go out with Gastón.
episodes.title: Capítulo 144

episodes.synopsis: Raquel discovers that Giovanni's alleged parents are actors. When he sees that Diego is sad, León tells him men are supposed to rule women; they hug.
episodes.title: Capítulo 145

episodes.synopsis: Paola finds Diego and asks him to take her back. Diego forgives Paola, but he doesn't go back to her. In an act of vengeance, Roberta kisses Simón.
episodes.title: Capítulo 146

episodes.synopsis: To hurt Roberta, Paola tells her she's made up with Diego. When Teo is accepted by the Lodge, Miguel plans on taking his place at the initiation rite.
episodes.title: Capítulo 147

episodes.synopsis: León gives Diego a car, which he crashes. Miguel goes to the Lodge; the members realize that he's not Teo, and they kidnap Teo for making fun of them.
episodes.title: Capítulo 148

episodes.synopsis: When Roberta asks Diego to rejoin the band, he refuses. Teo is tortured, and Giovanni is summoned by the Lodge members. Franco moves in with Valeria.
episodes.title: Capítulo 149

episodes.synopsis: The band members worry when they find out that Gastón saw them perform. When room guardian Giovanni tries to rescue Teo, the Lodge discovers them.
episodes.title: Capítulo 150

episodes.synopsis: Giovanni escapes from the Lodge and Tomás and Lupita find him. He tells Madariaga that Teo is in danger, and later he is found very ill.
episodes.title: Capítulo 151

episodes.synopsis: Miguel tells everyone that the Lodge members nearly killed Teo. Diego gets angry with Giovanni and calls him a traitor.
episodes.title: Capítulo 152

episodes.synopsis: Giovanni tells Miguel where to find the names of the Lodge members. The president of the Lodge assures Pilar that no one knows his real identity.
episodes.title: Capítulo 153

episodes.synopsis: Roberta saves some Lodge files from the fire. Mr. Mendiola finds out that the Lodge exists, but asks Pascual to destroy the evidence.
episodes.title: Capítulo 154

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Mendiola plans to blame Giovanni. The students demand justice and Roberta threatens to tell all. Rodrigo kidnaps her for meddling with the Lodge.
episodes.title: Capítulo 155

episodes.synopsis: Rodrigo tries to rape Roberta, but Diego rescues her. León demands that all Lodge members be kicked out and undergo psychotherapy.
episodes.title: Capítulo 156

episodes.synopsis: Diego and Tomás forgive Giovanni and invite him to go on vacation with them. Cosme tells Giovanni that his mom doesn't want him to live in her house.
episodes.title: Capítulo 157

episodes.synopsis: Alma convinces Franco to let Mía stay in the band. Franco flies into a rage when he finds out that Mía and Gastón are sweethearts.
episodes.title: Capítulo 158

episodes.synopsis: Giovanni begs Madariaga to help him recover everything he's lost. Gastón is upset because Mía is going to dinner with her dad and Miguel.
episodes.title: Capítulo 159

episodes.synopsis: Mía reproaches Miguel for going out with Luz Viviana. Later, Gastón catches him and Mía kissing and gets furious.
episodes.title: Capítulo 160

episodes.synopsis: Franco speaks with Alma to persuade her not to leave Roberta. Diego and Mía, Miguel and Roberta pretend to be sweethearts just to annoy each other.
episodes.title: Capítulo 161

episodes.synopsis: Vico, Celina and José want to pair Mía with Miguel and Roberta with Diego. Teo insists that José be his girlfriend.
episodes.title: Capítulo 162

episodes.synopsis: After kissing, Mía tells Diego that she doesn't want their friendship to change. Roberta cries because her mom plans to live in New York.
episodes.title: Capítulo 163

episodes.synopsis: Mía doesn't want Alma to go away. Madariaga tells Mr. Mendiola that he won't leave the school, and Renata tells everyone Madariaga is a murderer.
episodes.title: Capítulo 164

episodes.synopsis: Mía asks Roberta to do something to prevent Alma from going away. Madariaga threatens Gandía, vowing to create a scandal for being fired unjustly.
episodes.title: Capítulo 165

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Mendiola has a heart attack provoked by an argument with Madariaga. Madariaga tells his students that his wife and son died in a car crash.
episodes.title: Capítulo 166

episodes.synopsis: Roberta looks for Alma to tell her that she loves and needs her. Alma laughs at Valeria for saying that Franco is her husband.
episodes.title: Capítulo 167

episodes.synopsis: Diego and his friends invite some girls to their apartment; they turn out to be thieves. Miguel could destroy Gastón, but he doesn't do it.
episodes.title: Capítulo 168

episodes.synopsis: Giovanni will work in the school cafeteria while his dad gets him admitted as a student. Thanks to Mía, Valeria is arrested in a department store.
episodes.title: Capítulo 169

episodes.synopsis: As punishment for her role in Valeria's arrest, Franco suspends Mía's birthday party. Miguel is sick and tired of being humiliated by Gastón.
episodes.title: Capítulo 170

episodes.synopsis: Miguel visits an institution to ask for Gastón and discovers his name is Juan. Angelita arranges to meet Miguel to tell him about her nephew Gastón.
episodes.title: Capítulo 171

episodes.synopsis: Miguel meets Gastón at Angelita's house. Teo protects José from Gastón. Diego nearly dies after someone cuts the brake line of his car.
episodes.title: Capítulo 172

episodes.synopsis: Miguel asks Mía to lend him some money. Facundo tells Roberta that he sabotaged Diego's car. Vico weeps when Giovanni falsely claims they had sex.
episodes.title: Capítulo 173

episodes.synopsis: Diego suffers temporary amnesia after a blow to his head. For the sake of revenge, he plans to ask Roberta to be his girlfriend and then dump her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 174

episodes.synopsis: Roberta agrees to be Diego's girlfriend. Miguel and Gastón have a fistfight. Vico makes Giovanni look ridiculous.
episodes.title: Capítulo 175

episodes.synopsis: Miguel discovers that Gastón is a criminal. Miguel and Mía follow Gastón, finding out only that he's the son of Pedro La Cobra.
episodes.title: Capítulo 176

episodes.synopsis: Mía asks Gastón why he mistreats José. When Tomás pressures Diego to break up with Roberta, he lies, saying it would break his heart to make her cry.
episodes.title: Capítulo 177

episodes.synopsis: Roberta gives Diego the guitar she got from Lenny Kravitz. Lying, Alma tells Franco that Gastón is her boyfriend.
episodes.title: Capítulo 178

episodes.synopsis: Giovanni insults Vico. Pilar threatens Diego that she'll tell Roberta about his bet if he doesn't help her with Tomás. Roberta is suspicious of Diego.
episodes.title: Capítulo 179

episodes.synopsis: Miguel learns that Gastón paid to make him disappear. Roberta discovers the bet Diego made with Tomás to make fun of her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 180

episodes.synopsis: Miguel plans to find out if Gastón is a millionaire. Tomás tells Roberta that pity stops Diego from leaving her. Alma slaps Diego for hurting Roberta.
episodes.title: Capítulo 181

episodes.synopsis: Gastón tells Franco that he's not seeing Mía. Pascual informs the students that the school has accepted Giovanni's application to return as a student.
episodes.title: Capítulo 182

episodes.synopsis: Before the Principal and his schoolmates, Giovanni admits that he has no money and asks his parents' forgiveness. He also confesses his love for Vico.
episodes.title: Capítulo 183

episodes.synopsis: Lupita tells Mía that Miguel will return to Monterrey at the end of the school year. Roberta listens to Diego's explanations but doesn't forgive him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 184

episodes.synopsis: Gastón punishes the students. Valeria is enraged when she learns that Franco will give Mía her party. Meanwhile, Franco warns Gastón not to hurt Mía.
episodes.title: Capítulo 185

episodes.synopsis: Pascual scolds Giovanni, Diego and Tomás after finding photos in which they appear naked. Roberta assures León that Pilar published the one of Diego.
episodes.title: Capítulo 186

episodes.synopsis: Diego thinks revenge moved Roberta to publish his photo. Gastón plans to travel to Monterrey to investigate Miguel.
episodes.title: Capítulo 187

episodes.synopsis: Jacobo tells RBD they can't play in the cafe. Mia finds a letter to Lupita, who tells Nico that she's leaving for Guadalajara and may not return.
episodes.title: Capítulo 188

episodes.synopsis: Simón tells Roberta that he'll do the advertising for an RBD concert. Vico tells Nico that he blames Celina for Lupita's decision to leave.
episodes.title: Capítulo 189

episodes.synopsis: Renata says that Madariaga's leaving. Mia asks Roberta and José not to let Lupita quit school. Celina asks Lupita to forgive her for the letter.
episodes.title: Capítulo 190

episodes.synopsis: Diego doesn't want his dad to see the RBD ads. Roberta buries Mia's party dress. Mia doesn't want Valeria at her party.
episodes.title: Capítulo 191

episodes.synopsis: Mia gives Lupita and Vico the party clothes she bought them and Roberta tries to mend Mia's dress. Mia gets a rose from Miguel for her birthday.
episodes.title: Capítulo 192

episodes.synopsis: Roberta tells Mia she's sorry for ruining her dress. Someone sends Mia a birthday letter from her mom to spoil her day.
episodes.title: Capítulo 193

episodes.synopsis: Pilar tells Enrique that she tried to ruin Mia and Roberta's party because she wasn't invited. Franco discovers that Alma locked Valeria in.
episodes.title: Capítulo 194

episodes.synopsis: Miguel tells Mia that he never feels right without her. Roberta tells Mia it's obvious she adores Miguel. RBD sings at the party.
episodes.title: Capítulo 195

episodes.synopsis: Mia pretends to be drunk and kisses Miguel. Gastón reacts angrily when Mia leaves him. Alma tells Valeria she was cruel to Mia.
episodes.title: Capítulo 196

episodes.synopsis: Miguel forces Mia to tell Gastón that she's left him. Peter tells Mia he was the one who sent her the birthday letter.
episodes.title: Capítulo 197

episodes.synopsis: Madariaga doesn't plan to leave. Peter tells Mia that her mom wrote the letter many years ago. Mia decides to live with Alma and Roberta with Franco.
episodes.title: Capítulo 198

episodes.synopsis: Roberta and Alma argue about Mia. Leon needs the place where RBD will play for his campaign. Miguel thinks Mia's father caused his father's death.
episodes.title: Capítulo 199

episodes.synopsis: Diego is ready to confront his dad about Roberta and the band. Roberta decides to stay with Simón and not forgive Diego.
episodes.title: Capítulo 200

episodes.synopsis: Mia seeks professional help for Celina's bulimia. The kids go on strike to make Madariaga say why he's leaving. Gandía expels the scholarship kids.
episodes.title: Capítulo 201

episodes.synopsis: Madariaga convinces Mendiola not to expel the kids. Leon insists on knowing the RBD members' names. Diego tries to show Roberta that Simón's cheating.
episodes.title: Capítulo 202

episodes.synopsis: Madariaga prefers the student's anger to their sorrow. Gastón gives Mia an envelope with information about Miguel. Alma sees Simón with his child.
episodes.title: Capítulo 203

episodes.synopsis: Gandía warns the kids that the RBD members will be expelled. Franco tells Mia that it was Carlo who caused Miguel's dad's financial ruin and death.
episodes.title: Capítulo 204

episodes.synopsis: Carlo is arrested. Franco reproaches Miguel for his betrayal. Gastón tells Miguel his dad didn't die in an accident, but committed cowardly suicide.
episodes.title: Capítulo 205

episodes.synopsis: Nico tells everyone that Miguel plans to return to Monterrey. Celina is annoyed with Mia and Vico for taking her to a counselor.
episodes.title: Capítulo 206

episodes.synopsis: Franco tells Mia that he's going to marry Valeria. Gastón strikes and humiliates Miguel and Roberta defends him. Some of the kids' things go missing.
episodes.title: Capítulo 207

episodes.synopsis: Miguel and Diego prevent Gastón from striking Roberta. Monserrat asks Roberta to leave Simón for the baby's good. Valeria insults Mia and Alma.
episodes.title: Capítulo 208

episodes.synopsis: Elena tells Miguel his dad knew he was running a risk and after going bankrupt, suffered from severe depression. Alma and Mia go to Franco's wedding.
episodes.title: Capítulo 209

episodes.synopsis: At the very last minute, Valeria refuses to marry Franco. RBD holds a concert in the stadium. Miguel asks Franco to forgive him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 210

episodes.synopsis: Jose defends Diego from Leon. Yuli and Mayra oppose Lupita and Nico's marriage. Mia finds out that Gastón told Leon about the RBD concert.
episodes.title: Capítulo 211

episodes.synopsis: Gastón agrees to disband RBD. Gandía shows Gastón a photo of him kissing Mia, and Gastón demands that Mia tell Gandía the truth.
episodes.title: Capítulo 212

episodes.synopsis: Mia confronts Gastón for telling Leon about RBD. Mia asks Miguel if they'll ever be boy and girlfriend. Lupita and Nico hold a symbolic wedding.
episodes.title: Capítulo 213

episodes.synopsis: Diego asks Roberta to be friends. Miguel asks Mia to forgive him. Mayra convinces Lupita and Nico not to leave. Mia offers to travel with Roberta.
episodes.title: Capítulo 214

episodes.synopsis: Madariaga tells the kids that they need him in Chiapas. Mendiola has Gastón re-hired. Mia discovers that Roberta swapped her ticket for a cruise.
episodes.title: Capítulo 215

video.title: Rebelde
video.synopsis: Six students at an exclusive prep school, some on scholarship, discover that music can close the class divide.
